Abuk Payiti Ayik bụ onye ndọrọ ndọrọ ọchịchị South Sudan
Ọ bụ onye otu Transitional National Legislative Assembly nke mba ahụ, na-anọchite anya Sudan People's Liberation Movement ma na-eduga Gender, Social Welfare, Youth, and Sports Committee.
Payiti tinyere aka n'ịkwalite ikike ụmụ nwanyị n'oge usoro udo tupu nnwere onwe South Sudan.
Tupu nnwere onwe, Abuk Payiti nọchitere anya Malakal, mpaghara ókèala Sudan nke a na-ese okwu n'etiti ugwu na ndịda, na Nzukọ Ndị Omeiwu nke Southern Sudan
O sokwa na kọmitii nwoke na nwanyị nke ahụ.
O nyere aka kwado maka mkpa ụmụ nwanyị n'oge usoro udo na n'oge ederede nke nkwekọrịta udo zuru oke na gọọmentị Sudan.
Payiti nwere njikọ na Sudan People's Liberation Movement ma tinye aka na Women Commission.
Mgbe nnwere onwe gasịrị, ọ ghọrọ onye nnọchi anya Malakal County na Upper Nile State na National Legislative Assembly
Ọ rụrụ ọrụ na ndị omeiwu dị ka onye isi oche nke kọmitii na Gender, Social Welfare, Youth & Sports ma mesịa bụrụ onye isi oche kọmitii ahụike.

Dị ka onye na-akwado ikike ụmụ nwanyị, Payiti etinyewokwa aka na South Sudan Women General Association na Sudanese Women Empowerment for Peace, na-eje ozi dị ka onye nduzi nke tebụl nwoke na nwanyị nke ikpeazụ maka mpaghara ndịda.
The Sudan Tribune kọwara ya dị ka "onye omeiwu dị jụụ ma na-agbaso omenala".

Payiti lụrụ Peter Adwok Nyaba, onye ndọrọ ndọrọ ọchịchị ibe ya nke jere ozi dị ka minista agụmakwụkwọ dị elu, sayensị, na teknụzụ. E jidere ya n'afọ 2013 ma tinye ya n'ụlọ mkpọrọ, o mechara gbaga mba ọzọ na Nairobi.
Nwa ya nwanyị Keni Peter Adwok Nyaba bụ onye nnọchi anya mba South Sudan.
